bio: Dravos is a Dremora who defected from the ranks of Mehrunes Dagon to serve the Lord of Debauchery, Sanguine. He holds court in Rift Watchtower with a handful of other revelers, all of whom are locked in a perpetual state of bliss. The only exception is a Dark Elf named Batheru, who serves as the doorman for his eternal bacchanalia.
name: Dravos
